values.value: Please note, exceptional coverage for ARB medications only available on a case-by-case basis for the treatment of hypertension, where all other appropriate classes of antihypertensives have been tried, and not tolerated or have not been effective. Coverage may also be considered if the hypertension co-exists with DM and proteinuria where an ACE inhibitor has not been tolerated/ effective. Please provide additional details as applicable. Thank you.
